    • modifyItem

      public ItemBuilder modifyItem(BiConsumer<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack,org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta> meta)
      This method can be used to directly modify an ItemBuilder's ItemStack When methods are not provided. This method will supply you the ItemStack, so you can in-line modify it's properties.
      Parameters:
      meta - The ItemBuilder's ItemMeta
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder

    • cyclesWith

      public ItemBuilder cyclesWith(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack... items)
      When this Item is clicked, the ItemStack will be swapped with the next ItemStack in the cycle list. Once the end of the list is reached, the original item is set, and the cycle continues.
      Parameters:
      items - The items to cycle through
      Returns:
      The ItemBuilder
